text: Hey Raman - they send a signature with it which you can validate using the method described here: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/webhooks/validating-requests|https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/webhooks/validating-requests>

Hello folks, I’m having an issue with registration emails for membership I need to resend registration emails to a large group of users, however from having a look around there appears to be no way to do this via a workflow is there any other method that could be used to achieve this?
<@U7SL518D6> Does this mean I can’t reach the companies object from a regular website page?
yes that is what it means

That is correct, for more detail: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/data/crm-objects#:~:text=Object%20data%20that%20can%20only%20be%20used%20on%20private%20pages%20(requiring%20either%20password%20protection%20or%C2%A0a%20membership%20login)%3A|https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/data/crm-objects#:~:text=Object%20data%20that%20can%20only%20[…]tection%20or%C2%A0a%20membership%20login)%3A>
A work around you can do though is to store whatever data you need associated to that company in a custom object, that custom object can then be displayed.

Hey folks, I am new to HS CMS and I work as an HS dev. I was looking at the HubSpot CMS for Developers but there are a lot of missing pieces.

I want to speed up my learning so I can help my team develop the HS website. Are there other video tutorials that you would recommend?
Hey Krittiya, what kind of gaps are you seeing? I might be able to suggest some supplemental content if there are any specific areas you’re looking to learn about.
For right now, I am learning how to build repeat modules and I also want to understand the relationship between the local dev environment and the HS.

<@U031M9N4XCJ> have you seen these articles yet?
• <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/guides/getting-started-with-modules>
• <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/guides/getting-started-with-local-development>
I seen *Getting started with local development* and I develop the HS first project.
Hi guys, we (Webs) are an Elite partner that are looking for some HubSpot Dev experts to help us with projects. Anyone have some recommendations for good people? Freelance is okay as well.

Hi All,
Can we do workflow trigger on cancel a meeting booked in HubSpot?
